contentMeta.description: Vocabulary of statistics for Ice Hockey

concept.name: minutes-played
minutes-played
concept.definition: Number of minutes player was on ice.

concept.name: plus-minus
plus-minus
concept.definition: Number of times team/player was on ice when own team scored minus the number of times team/player was on ice when opponent scored.

concept.name: plus-total
plus-total
concept.definition: Number of team/times player was on ice when own team scored.

concept.name: minus-total
minus-total
concept.definition: Number of times tteam/player was on ice when opponent scored.

concept.name: penalty-minutes
penalty-minutes
concept.definition: Total number of penalty minutes accrued by a single player or team.

concept.name: goals-total
goals-total
concept.definition: Total number of goals by the team. Could differ from the score if score-points are awarded for shootout, for example.

concept.name: goals-game-winning
goals-game-winning
concept.definition: Goals that provided the winning margin in a game.

concept.name: goals-game-tying
goals-game-tying
concept.definition: Goals that caused the game to be tied.

concept.name: goals-power-play
goals-power-play
concept.definition: Goals scored while the team was having a power-play.

concept.name: goals-short-handed
goals-short-handed
concept.definition: Goals scored while the team was playing short-handed.

concept.name: goals-even-strength
goals-even-strength
concept.definition: Goals scored while the teams were at even strength.

concept.name: goals-empty-net
goals-empty-net
concept.definition: Goals scored on an empty goal, with the opposing goalie pulled from the net.

concept.name: goals-overtime
goals-overtime
concept.definition: Goals scored during overtime.

concept.name: goals-shootout
goals-shootout
concept.definition: Goals scored during a shootout.

concept.name: goals-shootout-attempts
goals-shootout-attempts
concept.definition: Goals attempted during a shootout.

concept.name: goals-penalty-shot
goals-penalty-shot
concept.definition: Goals scored as penalty shots.

concept.name: goals-per-game
goals-per-game
concept.definition: Average of goals scored per game.

concept.name: assists
assists
concept.definition: Total number of assists.

concept.name: assists-power-play
assists-power-play
concept.definition: Total number of assists made during a power play.

concept.name: assists-short-handed
assists-short-handed
concept.definition: Total number of assists made while short-handed.

concept.name: assists-game-winning
assists-game-winning
concept.definition: Assists on goals that provided the winning margin in a game.

concept.name: assists-game-tying
assists-game-tying
concept.definition: Assists on goals that caused the game to be tied.

concept.name: assists-overtime
assists-overtime
concept.definition: Assists on goals scored during overtime.

concept.name: points
points
concept.definition: Total number of points, with a score and an assist generally counted as one point each.

concept.name: points-power-play
points-power-play
concept.definition: Total number of points during power plays, with a score and an assist generally counted as one point each.

concept.name: points-short-handed
points-short-handed
concept.definition: Total number of points while short-handed, with a score and an assist generally counted as one point each.

concept.name: power-play-amount
power-play-amount
concept.definition: Number of power-play opportunities a team has had.

concept.name: power-play-percentage
power-play-percentage
concept.definition: Measure of success at power plays. Figured by dividing goals-power-play by power-play-amount.

concept.name: shots-penalty-shot-taken
shots-penalty-shot-taken
concept.definition: Total number of penalty shots taken by a shooting player.

concept.name: shots-penalty-shot-missed
shots-penalty-shot-missed
concept.definition: Total number of penalty shots missed by a shooting player.

concept.name: shots-penalty-shot-percentage
shots-penalty-shot-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of penalty shots that resulted in goals.

concept.name: giveaways
giveaways
concept.definition: Number of times that passes were attempted but intercepted. A judgment call whose exact conditions vary.

concept.name: minutes-power-play
minutes-power-play
concept.definition: Total number of minutes played in a power-play.

concept.name: scoring-chances
scoring-chances
concept.definition: Total number of qualified chances to score.

concept.name: hat-tricks
hat-tricks
concept.definition: Total number of hat-trick games.

concept.name: shots-missed
shots-missed
concept.definition: Total number of shots missed.

concept.name: shot-attempts-blocked
shot-attempts-blocked
concept.definition: Number of shots taken which were blocked by an opponent.

concept.name: shots-even-strength
shots-even-strength
concept.definition: Number of shots taken at even strength.

concept.name: shots-power-play
shots-power-play
concept.definition: Number of shots taken on power play.

concept.name: shots-short-handed
shots-short-handed
concept.definition: Number of shots taken while short-handed.

concept.name: shots-power-play-allowed
shots-power-play-allowed
concept.definition: Total number of shots on goal allowed during power-play.

concept.name: shots-penalty-shot-allowed
shots-penalty-shot-allowed
concept.definition: Total number of shots allowed as penalty-shots.

concept.name: goals-power-play-allowed
goals-power-play-allowed
concept.definition: Total number of goals allowed while the opposing team has a power-play.

concept.name: goals-penalty-shot-allowed
goals-penalty-shot-allowed
concept.definition: Total number of goals allowed as penalty-shots.

concept.name: goals-empty-net-allowed
goals-empty-net-allowed
concept.definition: Total number of goals allowed while the net was empty.

concept.name: goals-short-handed-allowed
goals-short-handed-allowed
concept.definition: Total number of goals allowed while playing short-handed.

concept.name: goals-against-total
goals-against-total
concept.definition: Total number of goals against for the given period. Could differ from the score if score-points are deducted for some reason.

concept.name: goals-against-average
goals-against-average
concept.definition: Average number of goals per game allowed by the team.

concept.name: saves
saves
concept.definition: Total number of saves.

concept.name: save-percentage
save-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of saves compared to total number of shots.

concept.name: goals-shootout-allowed
goals-shootout-allowed
concept.definition: Number of shootout goals that went in for a score for the opposing team.

concept.name: shots-shootout-allowed
shots-shootout-allowed
concept.definition: Number of shootout shots that were attempted by the opposing team.

concept.name: penalty-killing-amount
penalty-killing-amount
concept.definition: Number of penalty-killing sessions, aka number of short-handed sessions.

concept.name: penalty-killing-percentage
penalty-killing-percentage
concept.definition: Equals goals-penalty-allowed divided by penalty-killing-amount.

concept.name: shots-blocked
shots-blocked
concept.definition: Number of shots that were blocked. This statistic is generally tracked for non-goalies.

concept.name: takeaways
takeaways
concept.definition: Number of intercepted passes. A judgment call whose exact conditions vary.

concept.name: shutouts
shutouts
concept.definition: Total number of games where the opposing team did not score.

concept.name: minutes-penalty-killing
minutes-penalty-killing
concept.definition: Total number of minutes played short-handed, while the other team had a power-play.

concept.name: hits
hits
concept.definition: Number of body checks made against an opposing player.

concept.name: goaltender-wins
goaltender-wins
concept.definition: Total number of games with this goaltender.

concept.name: goaltender-losses
goaltender-losses
concept.definition: Total number of games lost with this goaltender.

concept.name: goaltender-ties
goaltender-ties
concept.definition: Total number of games tied with this goaltender.

concept.name: goaltender-wins-overtime
goaltender-wins-overtime
concept.definition: Number of games won while play is in overtime.

concept.name: goaltender-losses-overtime
goaltender-losses-overtime
concept.definition: Number of games lost while play is in overtime.

concept.name: faceoffs-total
faceoffs-total
concept.definition: Total number of faceoffs taken.

concept.name: faceoff-wins
faceoff-wins
concept.definition: Total number of won faceoffs.

concept.name: faceoff-losses
faceoff-losses
concept.definition: Total number of lost faceoffs.

concept.name: faceoff-win-percentage
faceoff-win-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of faceoffs that were won.

concept.name: faceoffs-even-strength-total
faceoffs-even-strength-total
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs taken at even strength.

concept.name: faceoffs-even-strength-wins
faceoffs-even-strength-wins
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs won at even strength.

concept.name: faceoffs-even-strength-losses
faceoffs-even-strength-losses
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs lost at even strength.

concept.name: faceoffs-even-strength-win-percentage
faceoffs-even-strength-win-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of faceoffs won at even strength.

concept.name: faceoffs-power-play-total
faceoffs-power-play-total
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs taken on power play.

concept.name: faceoffs-power-play-wins
faceoffs-power-play-wins
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs won on power play.

concept.name: faceoffs-power-play-losses
faceoffs-power-play-losses
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs lost on power play.

concept.name: faceoffs-power-play-win-percentage
faceoffs-power-play-win-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of faceoffs won on power play.

concept.name: faceoffs-short-handed-total
faceoffs-short-handed-total
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs taken while short-handed.

concept.name: faceoffs-short-handed-wins
faceoffs-short-handed-wins
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs won while short-handed.

concept.name: faceoffs-short-handed-losses
faceoffs-short-handed-losses
concept.definition: Number of faceoffs lost while short-handed.

concept.name: faceoffs-short-handed-win-percentage
faceoffs-short-handed-win-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of faceoffs won while short-handed.

concept.name: shifts
shifts
concept.definition: Number of shifts played.

concept.name: shifts-power-play
shifts-power-play
concept.definition: Number of power-play shifts played.

concept.name: shifts-short-handed
shifts-short-handed
concept.definition: Number of short-handed shifts played.

concept.name: shifts-average
shifts-average
concept.definition: Average number of shifts played.

concept.name: time-average-per-shift
time-average-per-shift
concept.definition: Average amount of time played per shift.

concept.name: time-average-even-strength
time-average-even-strength
concept.definition: Average amount of time played at even strength.

concept.name: time-average-short-handed
time-average-short-handed
concept.definition: Average amount of time played short-handed.

concept.name: time-average-power-play
time-average-power-play
concept.definition: Average amount of time played on power play.

concept.name: time-power-play
time-power-play
concept.definition: Amount of time played on power play.

concept.name: time-short-handed
time-short-handed
concept.definition: Amount of time played short-handed.

concept.name: time-even-strength
time-even-strength
concept.definition: Amount of time played at even strength.

concept.name: time-empty-net
time-empty-net
concept.definition: Amount of time played with an empty net.

concept.name: time-power-play-empty-net
time-power-play-empty-net
concept.definition: Amount of time played on power play with empty net.

concept.name: time-short-handed-empty-net
time-short-handed-empty-net
concept.definition: Amount of time played short-handed with empty net.

concept.name: time-even-strength-empty-net
time-even-strength-empty-net
concept.definition: Amount of time played even strength with empty net.

schemeMeta.definition: Vocabulary of statistics for Ice Hockey
schemeMeta.name: Ice Hockey Statistics
Ice Hockey Statistics
